name: Project Plasma alpha
description:
Project Plasma is a game created by me a.k.a roxgamer close to 100 subs on my yt! You must survive for 10 mins until the boss battle and achieve the good ending or the bad ending. There is also a secret ending that you can also achieve. More info in the game

Story:You are Bob. A kid who's really smart and has to stop the production of amogus aliens on the moon so they cant take over earth. You had to leave your sis and your girlfriend on earth as only your sister tries to take out most of the amogus aliens. 

If you downloaded this game and follow me I would really appreciate it!
